title.rendered: Ambassador Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa received the courtesy visit of the Dutch Vice Minister for Foreign Trade

content.rendered:
The Permanent Secretary, YOUWIN ConnectAmbassador Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa received the courtesy visit of the Dutch Vice Minister for Foreign Trade, H.E. Hanneke Schuiling and her delegation today, 6th June, 2023.
Discussions centred on strengthening economic relations between Nigeria and the Netherlands. Present at the meeting was the Nigerian Ambassador to the Netherlands, H.E. Eniola Ajayi and the Ambassador of the Netherlands to Nigeria, H.E. Wouter Plomp, among other officials.
